site.name: Astrodienst: The World's Premier Astrology Platform
site.tagline: Comprehensive horoscopes, expert interpretations, and professional-grade astrological tools from Switzerland's leading astrology company.
site.overview:
Astrodienst (astro.com) is the world's most comprehensive astrology platform, offering free daily horoscopes to professional psychological analyses by Liz Greene and Robert Hand.

Founded in 1983 by physicist Alois Treindl, this Swiss company serves 8 million monthly visitors with the proprietary Swiss Ephemeris engine and 60,000+ verified charts in the Astro-Databank.

Ideal for beginners and professionals alike, Astrodienst delivers unmatched depth backed by Swiss precision.

pricing.valueAssessment: Astrodienst offers exceptional value across all tiers. The free offerings alone surpass many paid astrology services, while premium reports provide genuine expert interpretation rather than generic computer-generated content. The EUR 61.90 one-time reports represent significant value given the 18-50 pages of personalized analysis by world-renowned astrologers. Subscriptions are competitively priced, with Astrodienst Plus at EUR 12.90/year being particularly accessible. For serious astrology students and professionals, this platform delivers unmatched depth at reasonable prices.

history.story:
Astrodienst's origins trace back to 1979 when Alois Treindl, then a physics graduate student at ETH Zurich, wrote his first astrology program on an HP 9845B computer. What began as an academic curiosity evolved into a pioneering enterprise when he started selling color charts in January 1980.

The company was formally established as Astrodienst AG on October 4, 1983. Treindl's background in physics proved invaluable, as he developed PLACALC and later the Swiss Ephemeris - planetary calculation routines that would become the standard for astrological software worldwide.

A transformative partnership began in 1987 when American astrologer and psychologist Liz Greene joined as the primary author. Her collaboration brought psychological depth to the platform's interpretations, elevating Astrodienst beyond mere calculation tools into a source of meaningful astrological insight.

The website www.astro.com launched in 1996, and the premium astro.com domain was acquired in 1998. The Astro-Databank, containing over 60,000 verified chart records, was integrated in 2009, cementing Astrodienst's position as the most comprehensive astrology resource online.

Today, operated from a villa near Lake Zurich by a small team of approximately eight staff members, Astrodienst serves over 8 million monthly visitors in 12 languages. The company maintains its founding philosophy of prioritizing quality over mass-market appeal, utilizing astrology to explore the deeper levels of human nature.

primaryUsers: Astrology enthusiasts seeking reliable birth charts
targetAudience.idealFor:
Serious Astrology Students: The educational article library, partnerships with CPA London and The Sophia Centre, and expert-authored reports make this the premier learning platform.

Professional Astrologers: Swiss Ephemeris precision, extended chart options with 385,000+ asteroids, and PDF export capabilities provide professional-grade tools.

Self-Discovery Seekers: Psychological horoscope analyses by Liz Greene offer genuine therapeutic insight for personal growth.

Celebrity Chart Researchers: Astro-Databank's 60,000+ verified charts with biographies creates an invaluable research resource.
targetAudience.notIdealFor:
Mobile-First Users: The lack of a dedicated app and text-heavy interface may frustrate users preferring sleek mobile experiences.

Visual Content Seekers: Those expecting video horoscopes or social media integration will find the text-based approach academic.

Quick Prediction Seekers: Users wanting simple yes/no answers will find the psychological depth less satisfying.

navigation.notes: Well-organized menu structure with logical categorization. The extensive content requires exploration, but main sections are clearly labeled. Site search and FAQ help users find specific features.

design.notes: Professional but dated aesthetic with text-heavy pages. Clean layout prioritizes information over visual appeal. The design has remained consistent for years, valuing function over form.

mobileExperience.notes: Site adapts to mobile screens effectively. Core functionality works well, though the text-heavy design is better suited to larger screens. No dedicated mobile app available.

accessibility.notes: Standard web accessibility with clear text and navigation. No obvious accessibility features highlighted. Multi-language support aids global accessibility.

pageSpeed.notes: Pages load reasonably well. Some CGI-based tools may have slight delays. Static content performs well.

depth.notes: Unmatched depth in astrological content. Educational articles span beginner to advanced topics. Premium reports provide 18-50 pages of detailed analysis. Technical resources like Swiss Ephemeris documentation demonstrate expert-level depth.

multimedia.qualityNotes: Chart graphics are professional quality. AstroClick tools provide interactive exploration. Limited video content - platform emphasizes text-based learning.

contactability.notes: Phone support available weekdays 9AM-12PM, 2-4PM Swiss time for order-related issues. Multiple email addresses for different departments. Clear physical address in Zollikon, Switzerland.

legitimacy.notes: Full company registration disclosed. Team page shows staff with biographies and birth data. Founder Dr. Alois Treindl's credentials (ETH Zurich PhD) verifiable. EU representative listed for GDPR compliance.

legal.notes: Comprehensive privacy policy updated March 2023. Terms of use clearly stated. Swiss data protection standards apply. TLS 1.2 encryption confirmed.

trustCredibility.summary: Astrodienst demonstrates exceptional trustworthiness. The 40+ year operational history, Swiss corporate registration, verifiable founder credentials, and transparent team information establish strong legitimacy. Swiss privacy laws and own-server data storage provide above-average data protection. The only minor gaps are the 2015 terms update date and limited direct contact options. Overall, this is one of the most credible astrology platforms available.

faq.question: What is Astrodienst (astro.com) and what does it offer?
faq.answer: Astrodienst, operating at astro.com, is the world's leading astrology platform founded in Switzerland in 1983. It offers free birth chart generation, daily horoscopes by Robert Hand, the Swiss Ephemeris calculation engine, access to 60,000+ celebrity charts in the Astro-Databank, and premium psychological horoscope reports by renowned astrologer Liz Greene. The platform serves over 8 million monthly visitors in 12 languages.

faq.question: Is astro.com free to use?
faq.answer: Yes, astro.com offers extensive free features including birth chart calculation with ascendant, daily and weekly horoscopes, access to the Astro-Databank, educational articles, and interactive AstroClick tools. Premium options include one-time reports (EUR 61.90) by Liz Greene and subscriptions like Astrodienst Plus (EUR 12.90/year) for enhanced features and ad-free browsing.

faq.question: Is Astrodienst legitimate and trustworthy?
faq.answer: Astrodienst is highly legitimate and trustworthy. It operates as a registered Swiss company (Astrodienst AG) since 1983, founded by Dr. Alois Treindl with a physics PhD from ETH Zurich. The platform operates under Swiss privacy laws, uses TLS 1.2 encryption, maintains its own servers without third-party data sharing, and has served the astrology community reliably for over 40 years.

faq.question: Who writes the horoscope reports on astro.com?
faq.answer: The premium horoscope reports are written by world-renowned astrologers. Dr. Liz Greene, an American astrologer and psychologist, authors the Psychological Horoscope Analysis, Yearly Horoscope Analysis, Relationship Horoscope, and Career reports. Robert Hand writes the Personal Daily Horoscope interpretations. Both are internationally recognized authorities in their field.

faq.question: What is the Swiss Ephemeris?
faq.answer: The Swiss Ephemeris is Astrodienst's proprietary astronomical calculation engine, recognized as the most accurate in the world. It achieves 0.001 arcsecond precision, spans from 13201 BC to AD 17191, covers 385,000+ asteroids, and is used by most astrological software developers globally. It's freely available for non-commercial use and as a commercial license for developers.

faq.question: What is the Astro-Databank?
faq.answer: The Astro-Databank is a comprehensive database containing over 60,000 verified birth charts of celebrities, politicians, historical figures, and notable personalities. Each entry includes birth data, biography, and astrological analysis. Originally developed by Lois Rodden, it was acquired and integrated into astro.com in 2009, making it freely accessible for research and study.

faq.question: How accurate are the birth charts on astro.com?
faq.answer: Birth charts on astro.com are among the most accurate available online. The Swiss Ephemeris reproduces NASA JPL data with 0.001 arcsecond precision. The atlas database covers millions of locations with historical timezone data. For accurate results, users should enter their exact birth time and location.

faq.question: Does astro.com have a mobile app?
faq.answer: Astrodienst does not currently offer a dedicated mobile app for iOS or Android. However, the website is fully responsive and works well on mobile browsers. Users can access all features through their mobile device's web browser, though the text-heavy design is optimized for larger screens.

faq.question: What languages does astro.com support?
faq.answer: Astro.com supports 12 languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Danish, Turkish, Russian, Chinese, and Japanese. Premium reports are available in up to 14 languages depending on the product, including Hungarian and Finnish for some reports.

faq.question: How do I get a free birth chart on astro.com?
faq.answer: To get a free birth chart, visit astro.com and click on "Chart Drawing, Ascendant" under the Horoscopes menu. Enter your birth date, exact time, and location. The site will generate a professional-quality natal chart with house placements, aspects, and basic interpretations - all completely free without registration required.

summary.recommendation:
Astrodienst (astro.com) stands as the definitive authority in online astrology, combining Swiss precision, academic rigor, and psychological depth in a platform unmatched by any competitor. The free offerings alone - including professional chart generation, daily horoscopes by Robert Hand, and access to the 60,000+ chart Astro-Databank - exceed what many paid services provide.

This platform is essential for anyone serious about astrology. Students will find unparalleled educational resources and institutional partnerships. Professionals gain access to the industry-standard Swiss Ephemeris and tools supporting 385,000+ asteroids. Those seeking self-understanding will discover that Liz Greene's psychological analyses provide genuine insight rather than generic predictions.

However, users seeking a modern, visually-driven experience with social features and mobile apps should look elsewhere. The text-heavy, academic approach prioritizes substance over style, and the dated interface may frustrate those accustomed to contemporary app design.

With an overall rating of 8.7/10, Astrodienst earns the "Excellent" verdict. The minor deductions for design and mobile experience are far outweighed by the exceptional content quality, calculation accuracy, and value. For astrology that respects both tradition and intelligence, astro.com remains the gold standard after four decades of service.
